code: import _toConsumableArray from"/Users/sangbongpark/Documents/GitHub/my-project/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/toConsumableArray.js";var ADD="addCart/ADD";var REMOVE="addCart/REMOVE";export var add=function add(payload){return{type:ADD,payload:payload};};export var remove=function remove(id){return{type:REMOVE,id:id};};var data=JSON.parse(window.localStorage.getItem("save"));var initialState=data?data:[];export default function addCart(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;var temp;switch(action.type){case ADD:temp=_toConsumableArray(state);temp.push(action.payload);window.localStorage.setItem("save",JSON.stringify(temp));return temp;case REMOVE:console.log(action);temp=_toConsumableArray(state);var idx=temp.findIndex(function(item){return item.id===action.id;});temp.splice(idx,1);window.localStorage.setItem("save",JSON.stringify(temp));return temp;default:return state;}}
